name: Virgilius
description:
Play in the role of Virgilius, a loving guide that will give everything to help the blind hero reach his goals. Pave the way and you will see your hero rise to glory, it begins now!

I made this in 6 days while also working day shifts soooo, I'll try to improve it.

THANKS BPJ for the great experience, this game was developed for their Jam (Bored Pixel Jam), my first ever Jam and I had a ton of fun in it!
